text: @as.uncion.teso I’m feminist and LGBT, and I’ve never said that, what is more, none of my friends ever claimed that. Show me one respected representant of this groups who says something like this. Youre argument is huge nonsense. This man is hurting society how? Show me one statistics that confirm your statement „many of thus guys are pedophiles and sexual perverts”. What is more, I don't defend him, I’m just tellig that you shouldn’t generalize and that calling someone that you don’t know „stupid” is shamefull.

@queen_astro Feminists and LGTB are always saying that ALL men are toxic, in fact, if you say "not all men" in an argument with them, they become even more triggered. This man is hurting society through and through, because he represents the only behavior that is now "acceptable" for a man while true men are being treated as shit. Many of these guys are are sexual perverts and pedophiles, which is why they want to teach their crazy way of life to kids at school. So don't be so quick to defend him, if anything, children deserve to be protected from this. Your blindness is as toxic as this guy in heels.

@phenomenalact1 It's not male bashing, it condemns behaviours like Catcalling, mansplaning, bullying, because that's what "toxic Masculinity" is. Gillette made this ad, because their target are men.  And toxic femininity exists, people are talking about, and I'm sure, one day, one of the "girly" companies, will make ad about this issue. Maybe sooner than you think.

@as.uncion.teso You're totally missing the point. Toxic Masculinity is toxic (bullying, mansplaning, catcalling). Not Masculinity itself! If man is patriarach than he hurts woman, and it's wrong. So that is toxic behaviour. Woman can be feminine as long as she is not hurting anyone(in any way). Same situation with this man, If he's not hurting anyone, then you have no right to call him "stupid", "idiot", because in this case you are the toxic one. It's not quantum mechanics.

@queen_astro he is a mentally disturbed person working for the elites who are destroying the human race by destroying masculinity and femininity. A man cannot express freely his manhood because he is considered "patriarchal", a woman cannot be feminine either because she's considered "oppressed". But this idiot can go around mocking everybody freely and receiving praise "for being himself" by unquestioning idiots such as yourself..
@queen_astro I got lost somewhere between the constant male-bashing with a "but not all men" slapped on it, and the fact that corporations know better than to go after toxic femininity.
Toxic masculinity is toxic. Not masculinity itself. When did you get lost in this ad?
@as.uncion.teso He's a human being, he is hurting noone, you may not be attracted. What you're doing is bullying. He is a "he's not "it".
No woman would seriously like that thing in the photo...

Apart from that, I’ve seen a change occur in society. I wouldn’t speak for most men but a specific ratio of men among the population have stopped pursuing women which is triggering suicidal tendencies and depression among women. The culture which has started to develop, if perceived by a woman’s perception is no different than striving for leftovers. A vast majority of intellectual men are more than happy to live in solitude. There’s no way these men can ever be convinced to get married or taken by a woman.

I rarely used Gillette. I think it has always been an overrated brand. There are many brands which provide much better quality with less investment including many other products other than just razors or shaving creams.
